statements: SELECT * FROM user_notifications WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT notification_id, notification_type FROM user_notifications WHERE post_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, notification_type FROM user_notifications WHERE interaction_id IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, post_id FROM user_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Like';
SELECT * FROM user_notifications WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND notification_type LIKE '%Comment%';
SELECT * FROM user_notifications WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, notification_type, post_id FROM user_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'message' AND interaction_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, notification_type FROM user_notifications WHERE post_id = 456 AND created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM user_notifications WHERE interaction_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND notification_type LIKE '%notification%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_notifications FROM user_notifications GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_notifications DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, notification_type FROM notifications WHERE user_id = '123456';
SELECT user_id, notification_type FROM notifications WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, post_id FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 'abcdef' AND post_id = 'xyz';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_type='new_message'
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications WHERE user_id='123456' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*), notification_type FROM notifications GROUP BY notification_type
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_interactions FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='like' GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 10 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC
SELECT notifications.created_at, interactions.created_at FROM notifications JOIN interactions ON notifications.user_id = interactions.user_id ORDER BY notifications.created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT type FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT message, creation_date FROM notifications ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS interactions_count FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING interactions_count > 5;
SELECT users.username, interactions.type FROM users INNER JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id WHERE interactions.type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM UserNotifications ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT notification_type, notification_message FROM UserNotifications WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT notification_type, notification_time FROM UserNotifications WHERE notification_type = 'email';
SELECT * FROM PostInteractions WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY interaction_time ASC;
SELECT alert_message, alert_time FROM Alerts WHERE user_id = 8;
SELECT * FROM UserNotifications ORDER BY notification_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT notification_type, notification_message FROM UserNotifications WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_notifications, notification_type FROM UserNotifications GROUP BY notification_type ORDER BY total_notifications DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, notification_type FROM UserNotifications WHERE notification_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;

SELECT user_id, notification_type, notification_time FROM UserNotifications JOIN PostInteractions ON UserNotifications.user_id = PostInteractions.user_id ORDER BY notification_time ASC, user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(post_id) AS post_count FROM posts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content, posts.created_at FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id;

SELECT notifications.notification_type, notifications.notification_content, users.username FROM notifications JOIN users ON notifications.user_id = users.user_id WHERE notifications.created_at >= '2022-01-01';
